name: pythonIndent.useTabOnHangingIndent
desc: After creating a hanging indent, press tab to leave the indented section and go to the ending bracket.

name: pythonIndent.trimLinesWithOnlyWhitespace
desc: Trims lines that contain only whitespace after pressing Enter on them.

name: pythonIndent.keepHangingBracketOnLine
desc: When creating a hanging indent, do not put the closing bracket on its own line.
